title: Looking to Buy an SGC T206 Spike Shannon!
author: Scott L.

posts.post_title: Looking to Buy an SGC T206 Spike Shannon!
posts.post_content:
Dropped a bunch of PSA cards off to SGC at the Valley Forge show to be crossed over and what was once a PSA 3 is now coming back as EOT. 

I thought I was out......and they brought me back in.

Please let me know what you have. Thanks.
